gr.forth.ics.graph
Enum Direction

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<Direction>
      gr.forth.ics.graph.Direction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Direction>
public enum Direction
extends Enum<Direction>

The direction that an eligible Edge sbetween two Nodes should have. Given an edge e that belongs to a Graph g, it is guaranteed that the edge will be contained in g.edges(e.n1(), Direction.OUT)), and similarly, the edge will be contained in g.edges(e.n2(), Direction.IN). Direction.EITHER denotes the union of both directions.

Enum Constant Summary
EITHER
          Either direction.
IN
          Inward direction to somewhere.
OUT
          Outward direction from somewhere.

isOut

public boolean isOut()
Returns true if this == Direction.OUT || this == Direction.EITHER.

isIn

public boolean isIn()
Returns true if this == Direction.IN || this == Direction.EITHER.

flip

public Direction flip()
Returns the inverse of this Direction. That is:
  • if this direction is OUT, IN is returned,
  • if this direction is IN, OUT is returned,
  • if this direction is EITHER, EITHER is returned.
